__TOC__

At the beginning of each release cycle, Ubuntu Engineering teams take a moment to reflect on deliverables from the previous release and then plan out the next 6mo development cycle.  Below are links providing this information from the Ubuntu Engineering Core division.  It is presented in a video format with references to the  presentation material.

The UE-Core division within Canonical is composed of the following teams:

* Kernel
* Foundations
* Phonedations
* Continuous Integration (CI)
